body_html:
SGTM. +1 to everything @martinwicke suggested.

I would suggest adding the function to:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/image_ops_impl.py

The function should check that its argument images is of the appropriate shape using _Check3DImage or _CheckAtLeast3DImage
body_text:

The function should check that its argument images is of the appropriate shape using _Check3DImage or _CheckAtLeast3DImage
body:
SGTM. +1 to everything  @martinwicke suggested.

I would suggest adding the function to:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/image_ops_impl.py 

The function should check that its argument `images` is of the appropriate shape using `_Check3DImage` or `_CheckAtLeast3DImage`
